name: Lavalette
description:
Lavalette

This game was made for Ludum Dare 51 with the theme "Every 10 Seconds".

Create your own world tile-by-tile in this digital board game. Every 10 seconds, you will have to place a tile on the board - But you can only do so with matching edges! Completing cities by closing them off on all sides yields extra points. How many points can you collect? Will you manage to fill the table?

Controls:
  • Mouse for everything
  • Menu: Esc
  • Fullscreen: F11
Used development tools:
  • Engine: Godot 3.5
  • Art: Krita
  • Audio: Audacity
  • Music: LMMS
